item.title: Install Nostr Rust relay without Docker
item.description: In this article we are going to see how to setup a Nostr relay without Docker. Prerequisites rust installed (else curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh) Run Nostr relay without Docker sudo apt-get install build-essential cmake protobuf-compiler pkg-config libssl-dev git clone -q https://git.sr.ht/\~gheartsfield/nostr-rs-relay cd nostr-rs-relay cargo build -q -r RUST_LOG=warn,nostr_rs_relay=info ./target/release/nostr-rs-relay And voila the relay will listen on port 8080.
